reviewText: Looks good for a movie from the mid-60's. If you're a Bond fan, give this one a chance.
A giant leap in quality over the old DVD. Good job in cleaning it up.

Film: 7/10 Picture quality 7,5/10 Aspect ratio: 2,35:1 orig. (= 16x9 letterbox) Audio: Engl. ST: Engl. o/- RC: B locked Studio: Network ...looking for more Euro Bond-spin-offs? Might try one of these: - That Man in Istanbul; E/I/F 1965 (feat. Horst Buchholz + Sylva Koscina; movie: 6,5/10) -> Spanish release: vella video DVD # 12058; 1 min cut! - Rembrandt 7 antwortet nicht; D/I/E 1966 (5/10; Rembrandt 7 Antwortet Nicht [Import allemand]) feat. Joachim Hansen, Christiane Maybach - Der Mann mit den tausend Masken; D/I 1966 ...as clunky as it gets!! (5,5/10; Der Mann mit den tausend Masken (Filmjuwelen) ) feat. soon-to-be Bond- + Hitch- Girl Karin Dor (You Only Live Twice 1967; Topaz 1969) - Jerry Cotton: Der Tod im roten Jaguar; D/I 1968 (feat. George Nader 5/10; Der Tod im roten Jaguar (Jerry Cotton)) - Mission for a Killer (aka Furia Bahia pour OSS 117); F/I 1965 (5.5/10; OSS 117: Mission for a Killer ( Furia Bahia pour OSS 117 ) [ Blu-Ray, Reg. A/B/C Import - France ]) - How to Destroy the Reputation of the Greatest Secret Agent... (aka 'Le magnifique'); F/I 1973 (feat. J.-P. Belmondo + Jaqueline Bisset 6,5/10; Le Magnifique ( Come si distrugge la reputazione del pi grande agente (The Magnificient Secret Agent) ) ( How to Destroy the Reputation of the Greatest [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 2 Import - France ]) +++ UPDATE: French-released 'Le Magnifique'- Blu-ray available from amazon.fr +++
